title: Tranquil Kent Countryside Escape near London & The White Cliffs of Dover
description:
Perfectly located off the M20, the boutique Ashford International Hotel & Spa is a blissfully tranquil property awash with understated luxury. Tucked away in the heart of the Kent countryside, with London’s bright lights within an hour's drive, this truly relaxing hotel invites you to embrace the nearby leafy green landscapes, café culture and postcard landmarks.

When you're not enjoying the hotel's host of amenities, including an ultra-stylish spa, heated pool, a state-of-the-art gym and two elegant dining venues, you'll be well located for exploration. Hit Ashford Designer Outlet's high-end shopping, visit Leeds and Deal Castle, unearth the coastal town of Whitstable and stand atop the White Cliffs of Dover. As an added bonus, with the Channel and Dover Ferry Terminal so close, France is just around the corner.
offer_address: Simone Weil Ave, Ashford TN24 8UX, United Kingdom

title: UK Charming Countryside Escape in the Heart of Ashford with Onsite Tavern
description: Brimming with old world charm, an escape to Holiday Inn Ashford - Central, an IHG Hotel is worth the trek out of the city. Spend days exploring the town’s boutiques and cosy pubs or jump on a Eurostar train to see the beauty beyond, including shopping and dining at King's Mile in Canterbury, unforgettable wildlife at Port Lympne Safari Park and the ancient architecture of Leeds Castle. Return to the hotel and indulge in European cuisine at Bybrook Tavern, a former barn turned restaurant.
location_description: Holiday Inn Ashford - Central, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Canterbury Road, Kennington, Ashford, TN24 8QQ United Kingdom

title: Family Friendly UK Country Escape Located Near the Eurostar Train Station
description: Experience the UK's quintessential country charm when you stay at Holiday Inn Ashford - North A20, an IHG Hotel, located just a stone's throw from where the Eurostar departs for Paris. There's no need to venture far for a top-notch meal when you can dine at The Restaurant, an open lobby dining concept, or simply order a Starbucks and enjoy it out on the terrace. When you're ready to explore, Leeds Castle and its centuries of history is just a 15-minute drive away.
location_description: Holiday Inn Ashford - North A20, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Maidstone Road A20 Hothfield Kent, Ashford, TN26 1AR, United Kingdom
